verses.verse: Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H6817>summoned,<s%> and they <S%H5674>crossed<s%> to <S%H6829>Zaphon<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H4069>"Why<s%> did you <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H7121>calling<s%> us to <S%H1980>go<s%> with you? We will <S%H8313>burn<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%> down on you."

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I and my <S%H5971>people<s%> were at <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> when I <S%H2199>called<s%> you, you did not <S%H3467>deliver<s%> me from their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that you would not <S%H3467>deliver<s%> [me,] I <S%H7760>took<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%> and <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> then have you <S%H5927>come<s%> up to me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me?"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H6412>fugitives<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> O <S%H1568>Gileadites,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> [and] in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>"

And the <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H9278>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> opposite <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%> And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> [any of] the <S%H6412>fugitives<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%>" the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> would <S%H559>say<s%> to him, "Are you an <S%H673>Ephraimite<s%>?" If he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%>"

then they would <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H559>"Say<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H9578>'Shibboleth.<s%>'" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5451>"Sibboleth,<s%>" for he <S%H3559>could<s%> not <S%H1696>pronounce<s%> it <S%H3651>correctly.<s%> Then they <S%H270>seized<s%> him and <S%H7819>slew<s%> him at the <S%H9278>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> Thus there <S%H5307>fell<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> 42000 of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in [one of] the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> [whom] he <S%H7971>gave<s%> in marriage <S%H2351>outside<s%> [the family,] and he <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from <S%H2351>outside<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
Then <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2075>Zebulunite<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> at <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>grandsons<s%> who <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H5895>donkeys;<s%> and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1985>Hillel<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> at <S%H6552>Pirathon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites.<s%>
